name: IBC Eureka (Skip)
description: IBC Eureka, launched by Cosmos’ Interchain Labs, enables secure and transparent connections between blockchains—marking a key step toward building a decentralized internet.

name: Skip Go
description: Provides MEV solutions for Cosmos and Evm blockchains, enabling revenue generation through block space auctions and transaction prioritization.

name: Squid Router
description: Squid lets you swap tokens between blockchains, and unlocks access to apps across chains in 1 click ✨ EVM + Cosmos.

name: Drop Money
description: Drop is a DeFi platform focused on providing liquidity across multiple blockchain networks, enhancing interoperability and transaction efficiency.

name: DaoDao
description: Platform designed for decentralized autonomous organizations (DAOs) to manage their operations.

name: pSTAKE Finance
description: A multi-chain liquid staking protocol that unlocks liquidity for your staked assets.

name: Hydro Voting
description: Hydro lets ATOM holders vote on project bids to direct liquidity and earn rewards. It’s in view-only mode, with pilot rounds ongoing.
